title: Casino Game Pack (Not for real Money) (April 2014)
description:
[3D Casino Slots] for PC Systems


Casino Slots delivers the best 3D Vegas-style casino action for your PC. This is a nice way to try out your luck on slot machines without using real money. Contains 6 Slot Designs.

[Hot 7 Slot Machine]
3 reel set at multiple values

[VRS Slot Machine]
3 reel set at multiple values.

[Hunger-Man Slot Machine]
3 reel set at multiple values.

[Lucky Farm Slot Machine]
6 reel set at multiple values.

[Fruit Slot Machine]
3 reel set at $1. This is the first slot on the floor that features free spins.

[Video Blackjack]
No Screenshot yet
Video blackjack game that allows bets at any amount.

Each shot can be play by using the slot lever, clicking the video screen, or by hitting the spin button. The bet can be changed by using multiplier buttons, this allow you to multiply the bet from 1-10. 

Casino Slots features an online high scoreboard that allow you to compare your luck and skill against other players from around the world. The Casino also contains an high rollers area that contains $10 slots machines. 

To uses the scoreboard look for the cash out A.T.M. located in the main game room. You can also reset the money using the A.T.M. if you need more. The A.T.M. does not take real money.

[Both Full Games, Just install and play!]


[Blackjack]

Don't waste your money learning at a real casino table. Play Blackjack first is a much smarter option to improve your strategy and have a real chance of winning; because Blackjack does not use real money. 

[b]Blackjack[/b] features an online high scoreboard that allow you to compare your skills against other players from around the world. So come see if your the best by downloading our free Blackjack video game software using the download button located on this page. 

Basic Rules
The player draws cards to an initial two card hand with the object of bringing the total hand value as close as possible to 21 without exceeding it.
